abstract: White House Memo; disparity between Pres Obama's sweeping foreign policy accomplishments and cramped domestic agenda is vivid evidence of a president hemmed in by a hostile Congress and a penurious fiscal climate, but still left with some powerful levers to pull as the nation's chief executive.
snippet: Rarely has the disparity between President Obama’s sweeping foreign policy accomplishments and cramped domestic agenda been so stark.
lead_paragraph: Rarely has the disparity between President Obama’s sweeping foreign policy accomplishments and cramped domestic agenda been so stark.

headline.main: A President Trying to Work the Levers He Still Possesses
headline.print_headline: A President Trying To Work the Levers He Still Possesses
headline.seo: Congress and Economy Limit Obama’s Domestic Agenda
